entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this evening. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
